name: feedbase
description: Feedbase is a simple self-hosted RSS and Atom feed aggregator that collects updates from multiple sources into one view. It focuses on minimalism and privacy, letting users follow news and blogs without third-party services.
features: RSS Aggregation: Collect feeds from multiple sources, Unified reading view, Privacy-focused. Follow news without tracking.
Minimalist Design: Clean interface, Fast performance. Distraction-free reading.
Self-Hosted: Complete data ownership. No third-party services.
Multi-Source Support: RSS and Atom feeds. Universal compatibility.
Feed Management: Add and organize subscriptions. Easy control.
Read Tracking: Mark articles as read. Stay organized.
Search: Find content quickly. Efficient discovery.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage. Fast deployment.
